entry.title: Wednesday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 early this evening then light near midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
